</ul></div></div></div><button aria-label="Select" class="gallery-quick-add button -action Button-sc-1kja9x0-0 dLTwkm">Select</button><div></div></div><div class="ConfirmationTooltip-sc-1ctqu11-1 xlink:href="#green-checkmark"></use></svg>Added to cart</p><div><a class="CheckoutLink-sc-1ctqu11-8 iQVVdf Small-sc-1qr0otk-18 bgZDBt" href="/en/gb/cart">Proceed to checkout</a></div></div><div></div></div></div></div><div class="StyledShelfTile-sc-1rx7z1c-0 lgLjvy ShelfTile-jriw8u-5 kGxNhB"><a data-ecommerce="product-click" data-id="574" data-impressionable="true" data-list="featured-products" data-name="Face Wash" data-position="2" data-price="6" href="/en/gb/products/face-wash"><div class="ShelfItem-jriw8u-6 jlDJys"><div class="ImageWrapper-jriw8u-7 chBnyv"><img alt="" class="ItemImage-jriw8u-8 konWqN" src="https://www.harrys.com/harrys-cdnx-prod/assets/images/index_images/attachments/4635a20a73b55aa2869fbda0c6d93b1e62ed0f20.jpg"/></div><div class="InfoSection-jriw8u-9 krnjpZ"><div class="ItemInfo-jriw8u-10 dgHabm"><div class="InfoWrapper-sc-1rx7z1c-1 ijYZRP"><p class="ProductShelfNameText-sc-1rx7z1c-2 fnOqRf Bold-sc-1qr0otk-13 lmxkmg Large-sc-1qr0otk-12 cOGJPZ">Face Wash</p><div class="PriceAndDivider-sc-1rx7z1c-3 kAzeds"><span>  |  <p class="ProductShelfPriceText-sc-1rx7z1c-4 gxMIYr Large-sc-1qr0otk-12 cOGJPZ">£6</p></span></div></div></div></div></div></a><div class="ProductSelectionElements-sc-1rx7z1c-5 DKpFF"><div class="QuickLearn-sc-1ctqu11-9 ewEDUY"><div class="QuickAddWrapper-sc-1ctqu11-10 eLZOfY"><button aria-describedby="quick-learn-tooltip-574" aria-label="quick learn tooltip" class="QuickLearnCta-sc-1ctqu11-12 eQKgRx"><svg class="icon QuickLearnIcon-sc-1ctqu11-11 kmtWZY" viewbox="0 0 15 15"><use aria-hidden="true" xlink:href="#magnifying-glass"></use></svg></button><div class="QuickLearnTooltip-sc-1ctqu11-2 jGNhZO Tooltip-sc-1ctqu11-0 fHuUeq" id="quick-learn-tooltip-574" role="tooltip"><div class="markdown"><div><div class="markdown--h1">What’s Good About It</div><ul class="markdown--ul">
<li>Contains volcanic rock, which cleans, scrubs, and smoothes your skin.</li>
<li>Natural essential oils of eucalyptus and mint leave your face feeling fresh and cool.</li>
</ul></div></div></div><button aria-label="Add" class="gallery-quick-add button -action Button-sc-1kja9x0-0 dLTwkm">Add</button><div></div></div><div class="ConfirmationTooltip-sc-1ctqu11-1 hKwBxH Tooltip-sc-1ctqu11-0 fHuUeq"><p class="Title-sc-1ctqu11-3 blqzKp Medium-sc-1qr0otk-10 RmSnH"><svg class="icon CheckmarkIcon-sc-1ctqu11-4 iunhkX" viewbox="0 0 49.48 41.9"><use aria-hidden="true" xlink:href="#green-checkmark"></use></svg>Added to cart</p><div><a class="CheckoutLink-sc-1ctqu11-8 iQVVdf Small-sc-1qr0otk-18 bgZDBt" href="/en/gb/cart">Proceed to checkout</a></div></div><div></div></div></div></div></div></div></section><div class="PrimaryHeroContainer-doox4r-0 avJCz" data-heap-visibility-instrumentation="HP-We-in-the-News-UK" data-test="PrimaryHero"><div class="PrimaryHeroBanner-doox4r-1 BRosi"><div class="PrimaryHeroContent-doox4r-4 cMsZFa"><h3 class="PrimaryHeroHeadline-doox4r-5 halYsi h3-sc-1qr0otk-1 jjZOYk"><div class="markdown"><div><div style="letter-spacing:1.5px;font-size:12px;line-height:19px;text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:700;">We're in the news... for <i>good</i> reasons.</div>
<div>
<div style="letter-spacing:0.9px;font-size:24px;line-height:32px;width:30vw;max-width:350px;margin-top:66px;display:inline-block;vertical-align:top;">“Some seriously well-engineered products.”<br/><span style="font-family:'museo-sans','Museo Sans','Helvetica','Arial',sans-serif;letter-spacing:0.4px;font-size:13px;line-height:26px;margin-top:20px;"><i>– The Jackal</i></span></div>
<div style="letter-spacing:0.9px;font-size:24px;line-height:32px;width:30vw;max-width:350px;margin-top:66px;display:inline-block;vertical-align:top;">“For a no-fuss wet shaving experience, you can't do better than The Truman.”<br/><span style="font-family:'museo-sans','Museo Sans','Helvetica','Arial',sans-serif;letter-spacing:0.4px;font-size:13px;line-height:26px;margin-top:20px;"><i>– GQ</i></span></div>
<div style="letter-spacing:0.9px;font-size:24px;line-height:32px;width:30vw;max-width:350px;margin-top:66px;display:inline-block;vertical-align:top;">“Beautiful designs add a contemporary edge.”<br/><span style="font-family:'museo-sans','Museo Sans','Helvetica','Arial',sans-serif;letter-spacing:0.4px;font-size:13px;line-height:26px;margin-top:20px;"><i>– Telegraph</i></span></div>
</div>
</div></div></h3></div></div></div></div>
